response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product that has been meticulously crafted by our team. This product holds immense significance not only for its financial worth but also for its potential to enhance various aspects of your life or business. We believe it could be a game-changer for you, offering unparalleled benefits that align with your goals and aspirations.

I am extending this exclusive invitation to purchase the product for $850,000. This price reflects our commitment to providing exceptional value while ensuring we receive fair compensation for the effort, resources, and expertise invested into creating this masterpiece.

Please consider this offer carefully. If you have any questions or require additional information to make an informed decision, I would be more than happy to provide further details. Your feedback and insights are highly valued, and we are open to discussing any concerns or considerations you might have.

Should you decide to proceed with the purchase, please let me know, and we will arrange the necessary steps for a smooth transaction. We look forward to the possibility of working together and contributing to your success.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 850000}
